name: Barbie as the Island Princess
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)

An adventure of a lifetime awaits you!



Barbie as The Island Princess follows a "party-style" storyline. You'll play as Rosella, the shipwrecked princess, who is raised by a "family" of animal friends and rescued by Prince Antonio from her tropical island. Through mini-games you will venture from Rosella's island home to the Prince's coastal castle for more adventure.

  • Interact with Barbie as Rosella, Prince Antonio, Princess Luciana, Tika, Sagi, Azul or Tallulah
  • Visit the Deserted Island, Royal Ship, Harbor Village, Apollonian Castle and the Greenhouse
  • 28 mini games including flower collecting, dress designing, star gazing, dancing and item collecting
  • Play by yourself or in co-op and competitive multiplayer
  • Includes footage and songs from the movie
  • Unlock special characters, dresses and additional movie footage
